alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Hampden; Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 6:51PM EDT until June 26 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hampshire County in western Massachusetts... Southwestern Franklin County in western Massachusetts... Western Hampden County in western Massachusetts... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 649 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blandford, or 10 miles west of Westfield, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Westfield, Northampton, Southampton, Williamsburg, Huntington, Conway, Russell, Westhampton, Granville, Whately, Chester, Blandford, Chesterfield, Worthington, Goshen, Cummington, Montgomery, Middlefield and Tolland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
